currentIssues.description: Chord symbols (Fmaj7, Em7, etc.) compete visually with lyrics due to similar prominence
Text size too small for teleprompter use case (3-10 ft viewing distance)
Gray lyrics text (#6B7280) on black background fails WCAG AA standards (3.5:1 ratio)
No visible focus indicators on interactive elements
Inconsistent vertical spacing between chord/lyric pairs

recommendations.title: Improve lyrics text contrast
recommendations.description: Change lyrics color from gray to white or very light gray for WCAG AA compliance

recommendations.title: Increase text size for teleprompter readability
recommendations.description: Scale lyrics to 48-64px and chords to 36-48px for optimal viewing at 3-10ft distance
recommendations.code:
className='text-5xl lg:text-6xl leading-relaxed' // for lyrics
className='text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-bold' // for chords

recommendations.title: Add keyboard focus indicators
recommendations.description: Implement visible focus rings on all interactive elements

recommendations.title: Implement consistent vertical rhythm
recommendations.description: Use consistent spacing between chord/lyric pairs for better readability
recommendations.code:
className='space-y-12' // parent container
className='mb-2' // chord to lyric spacing

recommendations.title: Differentiate chord styling
recommendations.description: Make chords visually distinct from lyrics using size, weight, or positioning adjustments
recommendations.code: className='text-2xl font-medium text-orange-400 opacity-80' // subtle differentiation
